treatment.reference: Ca2+ -ATPase mediated carbonate dissolution is prevalent among cyanobacterial euendoliths (Ramirez-Reinat, E., Garcia-Pichel, F., 2011)
treatment.file: Ramirez-Reinat, E., Garcia-Pichel, F. Mastigocoleus testarum.pdf
treatment.description: filamentous euendolithic cyanobacterium, is able to bore into solid carbonates using Ca2+ -ATPases to take up Ca2+ from the medium at the excavation front, promoting dissolution of CaCO3
